verbose_text: While a study has reported that the high concentration of PMA (50 ng/mL) induced phosphorylation of ERK1/2 in human NCI-H292 airway epithelial cells, the results of this study suggest that doxycycline inhibits MUC5B expression through inhibitory action on MMP-9 expression, and p38 plays a role in the signal pathway of down-regulation of MUC5B by doxycycline in inflammatory airway disease.
